title: Total War: WARHAMMER II
notes: The game runs absolutely solid performance and stability wise. I only noticed a few very minor 2D images not displaying correctly (Those yellow/blue/red colored things underneath the units for example). The game launcher does not display correctly and is one big white window, you just have to guess when to click to launch the game.

title: Total War: WARHAMMER II
notes: Launcher is a white box - you need to predict the Launch button (upper right part). GSync worked, but only DX11 available. Nearly cuts performance in half (compared to Win). No Shadows, some graphical glitches (flickering trees) and missing lighting effects. Game crashed 2 out of 7 times in loading screen. But was stable in campaign map for 3 hours.
Steam just launches a white rectangle (Wine window).
title: Total War: WARHAMMER II

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) R9 380 Series (TONGA, DRM 3.25.0, 4.17.19-1-MANJARO, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Some infos are not renderered and launcher is purely white. Ingame performance is solid. Perfectly playable if you are not dependent on the detailed info screen.
title: Total War: WARHAMMER II

gpu: AMD Radeon R9 Nano (FIJI, DRM 3.26.0, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: White launcher window, performance is quite low., about half of the first game (native)
title: Total War: WARHAMMER II

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: White launcher window, clicking in the area which I can only assume is launch game gives a 'server is not reachable' error. 'Retry' does not help, and clicking next makes a dialog window show up for half a second, then close. The game itself never launched.
title: Total War: WARHAMMER II
